Calculus
========================================================

## Exercise I
1. find $\frac{du}{dt}$ when $y=x^{13}$
2. find $\frac{du}{dt}$ when $y=x^{2a}$
3. find $\frac{du}{dt}$ when $y=x^{\frac{-5}{2}}$
4. find $\frac{du}{dt}$ when $u=t^{2*4}$
5. find $\frac{du}{dt}$ when $z=\sqrt[3]{u}$

## Exercise XVII
1. find $\int y dx$ when $y^{2}=4ax$
2. find $\int \frac{3}{x^4} dx$
3. find $\int \frac {1}{a} x^{3} dx$
4. find $\int (x^{2}+a) dx$
